Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.character

Class Character

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.character.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterInfluence, CharacterMN, CharacterProf, CharacterWithNoEntry, CharacterWithStudent
public class Character extends Object
Defines the properties of every Character: cost in coins and a description that summarises its power
